clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Investigated for use treatment in adenomatous polyposis coli lung cancer prostate cancer colon polyps Barrett s esophagus disease and pediatric indications

incompatibilities.description: The risk or severity of Thrombosis can be increased when Darbepoetin alfa is combined with Exisulind
The risk or severity of Thrombosis can be increased when Erythropoietin is combined with Exisulind
The risk or severity of Thrombosis can be increased when Peginesatide is combined with Exisulind
The risk or severity of Thrombosis can be increased when Methoxy polyethylene glycol epoetin beta is combined with Exisulind
